name: Dungeon Schmungeon
description:
A fast paced arcade survival game about using traps to kill enemies while surviving them yourself. 

You find yourself locked in a room with nothing but a clone gun and your wits!  use the clone gun to select and clone traps around the room and even enemies if you're going for a highscore.

this was originally made for a game jam and I don't plan on working on it further.
